title: 21: S3E21 – "Malicious Missives" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors S.P. Hickey, Lucretia Vastea, Carter Milford, and an anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about mysterious maladies, deranged decisions, technological terror, and unbearable truths best left buried. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e21
